overview: Award winning director Alex Romero lets you visit his perverted hospital in Medical Whores, where sexually deranged nurses and doctors can't help fucking each other and the patients. They say that sex is the best medicine - and it certainly seems to ring true in over two hours of saucy nurses whose bedside manner will set your pulse racing! Cast: Ash Hollywood, Milana, Athina, Kira Queen, Taissia, George Uhl, Lauro Giotto, Sabby
title: Medical Whores
